1.content:
Welcome to the Bleach Dating Service. Here, you can date anyone you wish: Go to parties, sparr with them, have a night with them - virtually anything you want to do here is permissible. There are, however, just a few things that are not allowed:
Manslaughter (unless you're dealing with Hallows), rape, molestation, drug use, robbery, or excessive swearing will not be tolerated lightly. If you feel compelled to perform any of these acts, make sure you first negotiate with one of our BDS managers, or you could be confined to the Repentence Cell within the Soul Society where, upon arrival, officials will spend anywhere from three days to a month on deciding what the according punishment will be. (Just ask Rukia. She'll tell you.)
Now that we have clarified on how we expect you to be have, let's take a look inside.
Our available candidates were hand selected just for this Service in order to provide you the maximum level of entertainment that you yourself expect or wish to be fulfilled, and we can proudly and confidently assure you that you will not be disappointed.
First, are you male or female?
1.title: Welcome!!!

11.content:
Alright then. Just answer a few more questions, and we'll have your candidate ready for you in a few minutes.
What do you like most in a woman?

But first we'll need you to answer a few questions: In your opinion, what is the most important quality that you expect to see in a guy?

info.brief_description: Go on a blind date with your favorite characters from Bleach.
info.description:
Welcome to the BDS (Bleach Dating Service) where you get to choose who you go out with.
Make your fantasy experience as detailed as you want.

RULES:
1. Sexual scenes are allowed, but try not to go overboard with the details. Sorry, but I want this to stay 18+. Besides, there might be little kids that watch the show!
2. Please keep the mature language to a minimum (or at least try). Again, it's a content matter.
3. ONLY CORRECT SPELLING, GRAMMAR, AND PUNCTUATION ARE ALLOWED!!! (I cannot stand bad writing.)

Those are the rules you must follow, period. And try to make it as detailed as possible. I only want to see good additions.

That's about it. Other than everything else, come on in and have fun.
